name: Simon
description: Memory game displaying a randomized sequence for a player to repeat by interacting with a game board.

name: Designing Your Life App
description: Web-based workbook for readers to record and update responses to the referenced bookâ€™s exercises. A user is guided through creating a Health/Work/Play/Love Dashboard.
alt: Desiging Your Life Companion App Landing Page

name: Ancillary
description: A furniture specification and budgeting tool for interior designers.

name: W&OD Trail Bike and Brew
description: An interactive map displaying breweries along the W&OD trail and access via Arlington bike routes.
alt: W&OD Trail Bike and Brew Landing Page

name: PickUp
description: A tool for riders to schedule a car pick-up to their local destination. The app checks a driver's availability, pairs with a compatible pick-up request, and displays the order details.

name: Contacts
description: A contact management application that allows a user to create, update, and delete contacts. The app pulls some contacts from an external database and consistently formats the information.
